name: Viva Aerobus, S.A.P.I. de C.V.
description: Viva Aerobus, S.A.P.I. de C.V. is a leading ultra-low-cost airline based in Mexico, dedicated to providing affordable air travel across the country and to international destinations. Established in 2006, Viva Aerobus operates an extensive network of routes that connect major cities in Mexico, as well as select destinations in the United States and Central America. The airline is recognized for its no-frills approach, which allows passengers to customize their travel experience by choosing from a range of services, including priority boarding, additional baggage, and in-flight refreshments. With a modern fleet of Airbus A320 aircraft, Viva Aerobus emphasizes safety, punctuality, and customer satisfaction, making air travel accessible to a broader audience. The company’s commitment to innovation and efficiency has positioned it as a prominent player in the Latin American aviation market, contributing to the growth of tourism and business travel in the region. Viva Aerobus aims to continue expanding its route network while maintaining its focus on low fares and high-quality service, ultimately striving to become the preferred airline for cost-conscious travelers.

seo.meta_title: Viva Aerobus | Affordable Air Travel in Mexico
seo.meta_description: Discover Viva Aerobus, Mexico's leading ultra-low-cost airline offering affordable flights and customizable travel experiences. Explore our routes and services.

faq.question: What is Viva Aerobus known for?
faq.answer: Viva Aerobus is known for being an ultra-low-cost airline that offers affordable air travel across Mexico and select international destinations.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Viva Aerobus?
faq.answer: Juan Carlos Zuazua is the CEO of Viva Aerobus.

faq.question: Where is Viva Aerobus headquartered?
faq.answer: Viva Aerobus is headquartered in Monterrey, Nuevo León, Mexico.

faq.question: What are the main products offered by Viva Aerobus?
faq.answer: Viva Aerobus offers domestic and international flights, charter services, travel insurance, car rentals, and hotel bookings.
